name: Mushroom Melt With Parsley Pesto, Kale and Arugula
description:
A vegetarian sandwich that is light on the melt and generous with the greens.

This vegetarian sandwich can be made in the oven, a toaster or in a panini grill. I use the toaster.
keywords: gruyère, kale, mushroom, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, nut-free, vegetarian, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 slices whole wheat country bread or 1 5-inch square focaccia, sliced in half laterally
3/4 ounce Gruyère cheese, cut in thin slices (I use a cheese slicer)
1/2 ounce baby arugula or wild arugula tossed with 1/2 teaspoon vinaigrette

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the bottom slice of bread with parsley pesto. Top with the sautéed mushrooms and top the mushrooms with the kale. Lay the cheese over the kale. Place both slices of bread in a toaster oven and toast until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes. Remove from the toaster oven, top the melted cheese with the arugula, place the top slice of bread on top, press down hard, cut the sandwich in half, and serve.
